properties.Observatio: Two water storage tanks of 35,000 litters and 28,000 litters and a 40,000 litter water treatment tank have been constructed and are operating as a community water scheme distributing water to 144 families. Even though the water treatment tank is in very
properties.Descriptio:
Cleaning the water purification tank by washing filter materials and installing a cover net

Removing all filter media materials, wash and re-pack in layers

Fabricating & fixing security weld mesh in open-type buildings in GI weld mesh 50mm x 50mm SWG 1

properties.Observatio: A small reservoir has been created by constructing a concrete dam about twenty meters long at the site of the spring. This will distribute water to three hundred families.
properties.Descriptio:
Repairing the dam of the tank by replastering 

Scarifying existing rock or concrete surface

Plaster 12mm thick in 1:3 cement and sand finished smooth with gray cement floating

Miscellaneous

properties.Observatio: About forty years ago, a water project was prepared to provide water to 75 families, and a water tank was built for that purpose. But since about 300 families currently getting water, that water tank is not enough.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of 03 nos. Concrete water storage tanks of 20 cum each of size internal t 3mx3mx2.5

Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal t 3mx3mx2.5
